languages.text: Если верить слухам, безумие, пропитавшее корабль Вольного Торговца, поразило и разум сенешаля. Очевидцы его страданий рассказывали, что голос возлюбленной супруги Катарины, по которому он так скучал, начал преследовать его повсюду. Сначала радостно приветствуя охватившее его сумасшествие, а потом в ужасе убегая от него, почтенный сенешаль пытался заглушить голос жены звуками приказов и воплей казнимых за небрежность членов экипажа. Вид этого сурового начальника, всклокоченного, в грязной форме, с силовым тесаком наголо в одной руке и звенящей корабельной рындой в другой, вселял ужас в сердца его подчиненных.

If rumours are to be believed, the madness that permeated the Rogue Trader's ship had struck the Seneschal's mind as well. Eyewitnesses to his agony spoke of the voice of his beloved and dearly missed spouse Quatharina beginning to haunt his every step. At first, the esteemed Seneschal welcomed the insanity that overcame him. Then, he ran from it in terror, trying to drown out his wife's voice in the barking of orders and the screams of castigated crew members. The sight of the grave officer, dishevelled, uniform covered in filth, with a power cleaver in one hand and a clanging ship's bell in the other, filled his subordinates with dread.
languages.original_text: Если верить слухам, безумие, пропитавшее корабль Вольного Торговца, поразило и разум сенешаля. Очевидцы его страданий рассказывали, что голос возлюбленной супруги Катарины, по которому он так скучал, начал преследовать его повсюду. Сначала радостно приветствуя охватившее его сумасшествие, а потом в ужасе убегая от него, почтенный сенешаль пытался заглушить голос жены звуками приказов и воплей казнимых за небрежность членов экипажа. Вид этого сурового начальника, всклокоченного, в грязной форме, с силовым тесаком наголо в одной руке и звенящей корабельной рындой в другой, вселял ужас в сердца его подчиненных.

traits.locale_text: If rumours are to be believed, the madness that permeated the Rogue Trader's ship had struck the Seneschal's mind as well. Eyewitnesses to his agony spoke of the voice of his beloved and dearly missed spouse Quatharina beginning to haunt his every step. At first, the esteemed Seneschal welcomed the insanity that overcame him, then he ran from it in terror, trying to drown out his wife's voice in the barking of orders and the screams of castigated crew members. The sight of the grave officer, ragged, in a dirty uniform, with a power cleaver in one hand and ringing ship's bell in the other, filled his subordinates with dread.

Abelard Werserian continued his service as a Seneschal. The madness, permeating the Rogue Trader's ship, struck his mind as well. The voice of his beloved spouse Quatharina he missed oh so much, started haunting him everywhere. At first, the honourable Seneschal welcomed this insanity, that overtook him. Then he ran from it in terror, trying to drown the voice of his wife with the sound of orders and screams of crewmembers punished for being negligent in performing their duties. The sight of the stern headman, scraggly, wearing dirty uniforms, with a power cleaver in one hand and ringing bell in the other, instilled terror in the hearts of his subordinates.

languages.text: 如果谣言属实，行商浪人船上弥漫的疯狂也渗入了阿贝拉德·韦尔森总领的思想之中。无论他做什么，他挚爱的妻子奎莎莉娜的声音都会在他身后响起。一开始，受人尊敬的总领以热情的态度欢迎头脑中的疯狂，但在那之后，他却惊恐地闪躲着，试图以命令与呵斥盖过他妻子的声音。如今，这位严肃的军官已变得蓬头垢面。他始终穿着脏污不堪的制服，一只手握着能量战刀，另一只手提着摇铃。他的样子让他的下属惶恐不已。
languages.original_text: If rumours are to be believed, the madness that permeated the Rogue Trader's ship had struck the Seneschal's mind as well. Eyewitnesses to his agony spoke of the voice of his beloved and dearly missed spouse Quatharina beginning to haunt his every step. At first, the esteemed Seneschal welcomed the insanity that overcame him. Then, he ran from it in terror, trying to drown out his wife's voice in the barking of orders and the screams of castigated crew members. The sight of the grave officer, dishevelled, uniform covered in filth, with a power cleaver in one hand and a clanging ship's bell in the other, filled his subordinates with dread.

traits.locale_text: 如果谣言属实，行商浪人船上弥漫的疯狂也渗入了阿贝拉德·韦尔森总领的思想之中。无论他做什么，他挚爱的妻子奎莎莉娜的声音都会在他身后响起。一开始，受人尊敬的总领以热情的态度欢迎头脑中的疯狂，但在那之后，他却惊恐地闪躲着，试图以命令与呵斥盖过他妻子的声音。如今，这位严肃的军官已变得蓬头垢面。他始终穿着脏污不堪的制服，一只手握着能量战刀，另一只手提着摇铃。他的样子让他的下属惶恐不已。

languages.text: Wenn man den Gerüchten glauben darf, hat der Wahnsinn, der das Schiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} ergriffen hat, auch den Verstand des Truchsess befallen. Augenzeugen berichten, dass ihn die Stimme seiner geliebten Gemahlin Quatharina, die er so schrecklich vermisst, auf Schritt und Tritt verfolgt. Zunächst begrüßte der geschätzte Truchsess den Wahnsinn, der ihn übermannte. Dann rannte er panisch vor ihm davon, versuchte die Stimme seiner Frau durch laut gebellte Befehle und die Schreie gezüchtigter Crewmitglieder zu übertönen. Der Anblick des düsteren Offiziers in seiner dreckigen Uniform, mit einem Energiebeil in der einen und einer dröhnenden Schiffsglocke in der anderen Hand, erfüllte seine Untergebenen mit Furcht.
languages.original_text: If rumours are to be believed, the madness that permeated the Rogue Trader's ship had struck the Seneschal's mind as well. languages.text: À en croire les rumeurs, la démence qui s'était répandue à bord du vaisseau {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} avait aussi gagné l'esprit du sénéchal. Selon des témoins de son agonie, la voix de Quatharina, sa tendre épouse disparue, commença à le hanter en toute circonstance. Dans un premier temps, l'illustre sénéchal ouvrit grand les bras à la folie qui montait en lui, avant d'être gagné par une peur insondable. Il tenta alors d'étouffer la voix de sa femme en aboyant des ordres et en se délectant des hurlements des membres d'équipage punis à la moindre incartade, au point que la simple vue de cet officier vêtu de son uniforme immonde, tenant un hachoir énergétique dans une main et sonnant la cloche du vaisseau de l'autre suffisait à emplir ses subordonnés de terreur.
languages.original_text: If rumours are to be believed, the madness that permeated the Rogue Trader's ship had struck the Seneschal's mind as well. Eyewitnesses to his agony spoke of the voice of his beloved and dearly missed spouse Quatharina beginning to haunt his every step. Then, he ran from it in terror, trying to drown out his wife's voice in the barking of orders and the screams of castigated crew members. Selon des témoins de son agonie, la voix de Quatharina, sa tendre épouse disparue, commença à le hanter en toute circonstance. languages.text: Según los rumores, la locura que se cubría la nave de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente acabó por extenderse también a la mente de su Senescal. Los testigos de su agonía afirman que la voz de su querida y muy añorada esposa Quatharina empezó a seguirle con cada paso. Al principio, el estimado Senescal aceptó la demencia que le acosaba, pero más tarde empezó a huir de ella aterrado, tratando de ahogar la voz de su mujer con el ladrido de las órdenes y los gritos de los tripulantes disciplinados. La imagen del solemne oficial, desaliñado, con un uniforme mugriento y portando una cuchilla de energía en una mano y una campana de a bordo en la otra, aterraba a sus subordinados.
languages.original_text: If rumours are to be believed, the madness that permeated the Rogue Trader's ship had struck the Seneschal's mind as well. Eyewitnesses to his agony spoke of the voice of his beloved and dearly missed spouse Quatharina beginning to haunt his every step. The sight of the grave officer, dishevelled, uniform covered in filth, with a power cleaver in one hand and a clanging ship's bell in the other, filled his subordinates with dread.

languages.text: アベラルド・ウェルザリアンは引き続き家令長としての務めを果たし続けた。自由開拓者の船に染み渡る狂気は、彼の心にもまた強く作用していた。今は亡き最愛の妻クアサリナの声が、彼の行く手にどこまでも付きまとうようになった。当初、高潔なる家令長は自らを冒す狂気を歓迎していた。やがて恐怖に逃げまどうようになり、命令をいくつもわめきたてることで非難するクルーたちの悲鳴をによって、妻の声をかき消そうとした。かの厳粛な士官が薄汚れた制服をまとい、一方の手には幅広の刃を携え、もう一方の手で船の鐘を振りかざすその姿に、部下はことごとく恐怖したという。
languages.original_text: Abelard Werserian continued to serve as Seneschal. The madness permeating the Rogue Trader's ship had struck his mind as well. The voice of his beloved and dearly missed spouse Quatharina began haunting his every step. At first, the esteemed Seneschal welcomed the insanity that overcame him, then he ran from it in terror, trying to drown out his wife's voice in the barking of orders and the screams of castigated crew members. The sight of the grave officer, ragged, in a dirty uniform, with a power cleaver in one hand and ringing ship's bell in the other, filled his subordinates with dread.

traits.locale_text: アベラルド・ウェルザリアンは引き続き家令長としての務めを果たし続けた。自由開拓者の船に染み渡る狂気は、彼の心にもまた強く作用していた。今は亡き最愛の妻クアサリナの声が、彼の行く手にどこまでも付きまとうようになった。当初、高潔なる家令長は自らを冒す狂気を歓迎していた。やがて恐怖に逃げまどうようになり、命令をいくつもわめきたてることで非難するクルーたちの悲鳴をによって、妻の声をかき消そうとした。かの厳粛な士官が薄汚れた制服をまとい、一方の手には幅広の刃を携え、もう一方の手で船の鐘を振りかざすその姿に、部下はことごとく恐怖したという。

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in gemisine yayılan delilik, söylentiler doğruysa Seneşal Werserian'ın zihnine de tesir etti. Çilesine tanıklık edenler, çok sevdiği ve çok özlediği eşi Quatharina'nın hayalinin her adımında ona eşlik etmeye başladığını söylerdi. Saygıdeğer Seneşal, ilk başta kendisini ele geçiren bu deliliği iyi karşılasa da bir süre sonra korkuyla ondan kaçmaya, eşinin sesini emirler yağdırarak ve dövülen tayfaların çığlıklarını dinleyerek bastırmaya başladı. Bir elinde güç satırı, diğer elinde geminin çanıyla gezen; bakımsız, kirli üniformalı, katı subayın görüntüsü bile emrindekileri dehşete düşürmeye yetiyordu.
languages.original_text: If rumours are to be believed, the madness that permeated the Rogue Trader's ship had struck the Seneschal's mind as well. Eyewitnesses to his agony spoke of the voice of his beloved and dearly missed spouse Quatharina beginning to haunt his every step. At first, the esteemed Seneschal welcomed the insanity that overcame him. Then, he ran from it in terror, trying to drown out his wife's voice in the barking of orders and the screams of castigated crew members. The sight of the grave officer, dishevelled, uniform covered in filth, with a power cleaver in one hand and a clanging ship's bell in the other, filled his subordinates with dread.
